context_of_use: This use case describes the process for a systems analyst to collect and access clinical data for analytics purposes.
stakeholders_and_interests: systems analyst: needs access to clinical data for analytics
description: This use case allows a systems analyst to collect and provide access to clinical data required for prescriptive and predictive analytics.
triggering_event: The systems analyst initiates the data collection process.
preconditions: The systems analyst is logged into the clinical data management system.
Clinical data is available for collection.
postconditions: Clinical data is successfully collected and accessible for analytics.
assumptions: The clinical data management system has the capability to collect and store clinical data.
The systems analyst has the necessary permissions to access clinical data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the systems analyst to collect clinical data.
The system shall provide access to collected clinical data for analytics.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of clinical data to be collected.
main_flow: 1. systems analyst → System collects clinical data.
2. systems analyst → System provides access to collected clinical data.
